#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define size 200001
#define gc getchar
inline void inp(int *n )
{
*n=0;
int ch=gc();int sign=1;
while( ch < '0' || ch > '9' ){if(ch=='-')sign=-1; ch=gc();}
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
*n = (*n<<3)+(*n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=gc();
*n=*n*sign;
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,terms,diff,sum;
    inp(&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        sum=0;
        inp(&n);
        while(n--)
        {

            int last,first;
            inp(&diff); inp(&last);
            first=last%diff;
            terms=last/diff + 1;
            sum+=((terms) * (first +last))/2;
        }
        
        if(sum%2!=0) printf("YES\n");
        else printf("NO\n");
    }
 return 0;
}
